overview: The 'More Information' page of Digital Experience Healthcare provides interactive search, filter, sort, FAQ accordion, and tabbed content for exploring healthcare services. It includes accessibility features, dynamic content placeholders, and navigation elements.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
Services grid with skeleton loaders and no-results state
Tabbed content section for additional information
interactions: Search input updates service results dynamically
FAQ buttons expand/collapse panels with aria-expanded state changes
Theme toggle switches between light/dark mode
data_flow: User input in search field triggers filtering of service cards
Filter chip clicks modify displayed services via data-filter attributes
Sort dropdown changes order of service cards
FAQ button toggles hidden state of corresponding panel
Theme toggle updates global UI theme preference
accessibility: ARIA roles for navigation, group, region, and tablist
aria-expanded and aria-controls for FAQ and tab interactions
Visually hidden labels for search and tab headings
analytics: Track search input usage and query terms
Page view and navigation link clicks
test_ideas: Verify search filters services correctly and hides no-results when matches exist
Ensure filter chips toggle active state and update displayed services
Validate sort dropdown reorders services alphabetically and by popularity
Check FAQ accordion expands one panel at a time and updates aria-expanded
Confirm theme toggle persists preference across reloads
Test skip-to-content link moves focus to main content
Ensure skeleton loaders are replaced by actual service cards after data load
Validate accessibility attributes and keyboard navigation for all interactive elements
